verses.name: 1 Kings 4:21
verses.text: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:22
verses.text: And Solomon’s provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:23
verses.text: Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.
